DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial study well 68Ga-PSMA-11 positron emission tomography ( PET ) /computed tomography ( CT ) work detect prostate cancer come back patient initial therapy . Diagnostic procedure , 68Ga-PSMA-11PET/CT , may help doctor detect tumor come back initial therapy .
DOC.brief_title: 68Ga-PSMA-11 PET/CT Detecting Recurrent Prostate Cancer Patients After Initial Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate 68gallium ( Ga ) -prostate-specific membrane antigen ( PSMA ) PET/CT detection recurrent prostate cancer initial therapy patient elevate PSA non-contributory bone scintigraphy , compute tomography ( CT ) magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) . OUTLINE : Patients receive gallium Ga 68-labeled PSMA ligand glutamic acid ( Glu ) -urea-lysine ( Lys ) ( Ahx ) intravenously ( IV ) 45-60 minute undergo PET/CT . After completion study , patient follow every 3-6 month 1 year .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Histopathological proven prostate adenocarcinoma . 2 . Rising PSA definitive therapy prostatectomy radiation therapy ( external beam brachytherapy ) . . Post radical prostatectomy ( RP ) AUA recommendation i. PSA great 0.2 ng/mL measure 6 week RP , ii . Confirmatory persistent PSA great 0.2 ng/mL b. Postradiation therapy ASTROPhoenix consensus definition i. Nadir + great equal 2 ng/mL rise PSA 3 . Able provide write consent . 4 . Karnofsky performance status 50 ( ECOG/WHO equivalent ) . 1 . Investigational therapy prostate cancer . 2 . Unable lie flat , still tolerate PET scan . 3 . Prior history malignancy within last 2 year , skin basal cell cutaneous superficial squamous cell carcinoma metastasize superficial bladder cancer . 4 . Contraindication furosemide administration include prior allergy adverse reaction furosemide sulfa drug . ( Note : This exclusion criterion remove Furosemide omit part PET image protocol secondgeneration scatter correction available use PET device ) .
